name: king Of Classic Ludo
description:
king Of Classic Ludo offers you awesome classic board game play.king Of Classic Ludo is an interesting and exciting board game which you can play with computer and your friends. king Of Classic Ludo has four players red, green, blue and yellow. Are you ready for the royal adventure? Play it with your friends and become the king of the classic Ludo.
king Of Classic Ludo: Features

Play against computer
Dice with Player Colors
Simple and smooth game play
All time classic family game
